text: John Gordon Leggat was born 27 May, 1926 in Wellington and died 10 March, 1973. He was a New Zealand cricketer who played nine tests for New Zealand and for Canterbury in the Plunket Shield. He was the cousin of cricketer Ian Leggat. ==Other websites== * Category:1926 births Category:1973 deaths Category:New Zealand cricketers
title: Gordon Leggat
